goals__remit:
Knauf Insulation is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of insulation products and solutions. 
With more than 30 years of experience in the industry, we represent one of the fastest growing and most respected names in insulation worldwide. 
We are committed to our customers and to helping them to meet the increasing demand for energy efficiency and sustainability in new and existing homes, non-residential buildings and industrial applications by creating innovative and customer-friendly solutions designed for real performance.
